void eol_logger_deinit (void)
void eol_logger_info (char *msg,...)
 log a message at the info warning level. It will ignore warning levels below the threshold.
void eol_logger_warn (char *msg,...)
 log a message at the "warning" warning level. It will ignore warning levels below the threshold.
void eol_logger_error (char *msg,...)
 log a message at the error warning level. It will ignore warning levels below the threshold.
void eol_logger_fatal (char *msg,...)
 log a message at the fatal warning level. It will ignore warning levels below the threshold.
void eol_logger_message (eolLogLevel level, char *msg,...)
 log a message at the specified warning levels. It will ignore warning levels below the threshold.
void eol_logger_init ()
 initializes logging system
void eol_logger_set_threshold (eolLogLevel level)
 sets how verbose logging will be.
void eol_logger_load_config ()
 loads up configuration from file or if no file available it will set defaults.
